revision.text: Possibly: A treatise on the study of antiquities as the commentary to historical learning, sketching out a general line of research: also marking and explaining some of the desiderata. With an appendix. No I. On the elements of speach. No II. On the origin of written language, picture, hieroglyphic, and elementary-writing. No III. On the ships of the ancients. No IV. On the chariots of the ancients. By T. Pownall. (Thomas Pownall). (London : Printed for J. Dodsley, in Pall-Mall, M.DCC.LXXXII. [1782]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2422997~S1
